```
1→'use client';
     2→
     3→import { useEffect, useState } from 'react';
     4→import { useAuth } from '@/app/context/AuthContext';
     5→import { useRouter } from 'next/navigation';
     6→import DriggsmanTable from './components/DriggsmanTable';
     7→import dynamic from 'next/dynamic';
     8→
     9→
    10→const DrenjariButtonBarDriggsmanLinks = dynamic(
    11→  () => import('@/app/components/DrenjariButtonBarDriggsmanLinks'),
    12→  { ssr: false }
    13→);
    14→
    15→export default function DriggsmanClient() {
    16→  const { user } = useAuth();
    17→  const router = useRouter();
    18→  const [isHeaderVisible, setIsHeaderVisible] = useState<boolean>(() => {
    19→    // Initialize from localStorage with default as false (hidden)
    20→    if (typeof window !== 'undefined') {
    21→      const saved = localStorage.getItem('driggsman-header-visible');
    22→      return saved === null ? false : saved === 'true';
    23→    }
    24→    return false;
    25→  });
    26→
    27→  // Controls state for pagination and search
    28→  const [paginationControls, setPaginationControls] = useState<{
    29→    PaginationControls: () => JSX.Element;
    30→    ColumnPaginationControls: () => JSX.Element;
    31→  } | null>(null);
    32→
    33→  // Button states moved from DriggsmanTable
    34→  const [showVerificationColumn, setShowVerificationColumn] = useState(false);
    35→  const [showCompetitorSites, setShowCompetitorSites] = useState(false);
    36→  const [sitesCount, setSitesCount] = useState(0);
    37→
    38→  useEffect(() => {
    39→    if (!user) {
    40→      router.push('/login');
    41→      return;
    42→    }
    43→  }, [user, router]);
    44→
    45→  // Save header visibility state to localStorage and update body class
    46→  useEffect(() => {
    47→    localStorage.setItem('driggsman-header-visible', isHeaderVisible.toString());
    48→    
    49→    // Add/remove class on body to hide main header
    50→    if (isHeaderVisible) {
    51→      document.body.classList.remove('driggsman-hide-main-header');
    52→    } else {
    53→      document.body.classList.add('driggsman-hide-main-header');
    54→    }
    55→    
    56→    // Cleanup on unmount
    57→    return () => {
    58→      document.body.classList.remove('driggsman-hide-main-header');
    59→    };
    60→  }, [isHeaderVisible]);
    61→
    62→  if (!user) {
    63→    return (
    64→      <div className="min-h-screen bg-gray-50 flex items-center justify-center">
    65→        <div className="text-gray-500">Loading...</div>
    66→      </div>
    67→    );
    68→  }
    69→
    70→  return (
    71→    <div className="min-h-screen bg-gray-50 flex flex-col">
    72→      {/* Hide/Show Header Button and Navigation */}
    73→      <div className="px-6 py-1 bg-gray-50 flex items-center space-x-4">
    74→        <button
    75→          onClick={() => setIsHeaderVisible(!isHeaderVisible)}
    76→          className="px-3 py-1 text-sm bg-gray-200 hover:bg-gray-300 rounded transition-colors"
    77→        >
    78→          {isHeaderVisible ? 'Hide Page Header' : 'Show Page Header'}
    79→        </button>
    80→        
    81→        {/* Drenjari Navigation Links */}
    82→        <div>
    83→          <DrenjariButtonBarDriggsmanLinks />
    84→        </div>
    85→
    86→        {/* Verification and Competitor Buttons */}
    87→        <div className="flex items-center space-x-2">
    88→          <button
    89→            onClick={() => setShowVerificationColumn(!showVerificationColumn)}
    90→            className={`px-3 py-1 text-sm rounded transition-colors ${
    91→              showVerificationColumn ? 'bg-blue-200 hover:bg-blue-300' : 'bg-gray-200 hover:bg-gray-300'
    92→            }`}
    93→          >
    94→            show verification column
    95→          </button>
    96→          <button
    97→            onClick={() => setShowCompetitorSites(!showCompetitorSites)}
    98→            className={`px-3 py-1 text-sm rounded transition-colors ${
    99→              showCompetitorSites ? 'bg-blue-200 hover:bg-blue-300' : 'bg-gray-200 hover:bg-gray-300'
   100→            }`}
   101→          >
   102→            show competitor sites
   103→          </button>
   104→        </div>
   105→      </div>
   106→      {/* Pagination and Search Controls */}
   107→      {paginationControls && (
   108→        <div className="px-6 py-1 bg-white border-b">
   109→          <div className="flex items-center space-x-6">
   110→            <span className="px-3 py-1 bg-blue-50 text-blue-700 rounded text-sm">
   111→              {sitesCount} sites loaded
   112→            </span>
   113→            <div className="flex items-center">
   114→              {paginationControls.PaginationControls()}
   115→            </div>
   116→            <div className="flex items-center">
   117→              {paginationControls.ColumnPaginationControls()}
   118→            </div>
   119→          </div>
   120→        </div>
   121→      )}
   122→
   123→      {/* Main Content - Full Width DriggsmanTable */}
   124→      <div className="flex-1 overflow-hidden">
   125→        <DriggsmanTable 
   126→          onControlsRender={setPaginationControls}
   127→          showVerificationColumn={showVerificationColumn}
   128→          showCompetitorSites={showCompetitorSites}
   129→          onSitesCountChange={setSitesCount}
   130→        />
   131→      </div>
   132→    </div>
   133→  );
   134→}
```

```
interface DriggsmanTableProps {
  onControlsRender?: (controls: {
    PaginationControls: () => JSX.Element;
    ColumnPaginationControls: () => JSX.Element;
  }) => void;
  showVerificationColumn?: boolean;
  showCompetitorSites?: boolean;
  onSitesCountChange?: (count: number) => void;
}
export default function DriggsmanTable({ 
  onControlsRender,
  showVerificationColumn = false,
  showCompetitorSites = false,
  onSitesCountChange
}: DriggsmanTableProps) {
  const [sites, setSites] = useState<SitesprenSite[]>([]);

  const [error, setError] = useState<string | null>(null);
  const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState('');
  const [currentPage, setCurrentPage] = useState(1);
```

```
    } else {
      newSelected.add(siteId);
    }
    setSelectedSiteIds(newSelected);
```

Tool use: **Read** `./app/(protected)/driggsman/components/driggspackmedallion/DriggsPackMedallion.tsx`

Result:

```
1→'use client';
     2→
     3→import React from 'react';
     4→
     5→interface DriggsPackMedallionProps {
     6→  driggspackNumber: number;
     7→  siteId: string;
     8→  onZzClick: (event: React.MouseEvent<HTMLTableCellElement>, zzType: string, siteId: string) => void;
     9→  onMiddleClick?: (driggspackType: string, siteId: string) => void;
    10→  onBottomClick?: (driggspackType: string, siteId: string) => void;
    11→}
    12→
    13→const DriggsPackMedallion: React.FC<DriggsPackMedallionProps> = ({
    14→  driggspackNumber,
    15→  siteId,
    16→  onZzClick,
    17→  onMiddleClick,
    18→  onBottomClick
    19→}) => {
    20→  // Define the content for each row based on the driggspack number
    21→  const getZzText = () => `zz${driggspackNumber}`;
    22→  
    23→  const getMiddleText = () => {
    24→    switch (driggspackNumber) {
    25→      case 1: return 'full1 (for ref)';
    26→      case 2: return 'for citations';
    27→      case 3: return 'for chat with ai';
    28→      default: return `middle${driggspackNumber}`;
    29→    }
    30→  };
    31→  
    32→  const getBottomText = () => `driggspack${driggspackNumber}`;
    33→
    34→  const handleMiddleClick = () => {
    35→    if (onMiddleClick) {
    36→      onMiddleClick(`driggspack${driggspackNumber}-middle`, siteId);
    37→    } else {
    38→      console.log(`driggspack${driggspackNumber}-middle`, siteId);
    39→    }
    40→  };
    41→
    42→  const handleBottomClick = () => {
    43→    if (onBottomClick) {
    44→      onBottomClick(`driggspack${driggspackNumber}`, siteId);
    45→    } else {
    46→      console.log(`driggspack${driggspackNumber}`, siteId);
    47→    }
    48→  };
    49→
    50→  return (
    51→    <table className="border-collapse" style={{ fontSize: '14px' }}>
    52→      <tbody>
    53→        {/* Top row - zz1/zz2/zz3 */}
    54→        <tr>
    55→          <td 
    56→            className="px-2 py-1 bg-gray-100 text-gray-600 text-center border cursor-pointer hover:bg-gray-200" 
    57→            onClick={(e) => onZzClick(e, getZzText(), siteId)}
    58→          >
    59→            {getZzText()}
    60→          </td>
    61→        </tr>
    62→        
    63→        {/* Middle row - contextual text */}
    64→        <tr>
    65→          <td 
    66→            className="px-2 py-1 bg-gray-150 text-gray-600 text-center border cursor-pointer hover:bg-gray-250" 
    67→            onClick={handleMiddleClick}
    68→          >
    69→            {getMiddleText()}
    70→          </td>
    71→        </tr>
    72→        
    73→        {/* Bottom row - driggspack text */}
    74→        <tr>
    75→          <td 
    76→            className="px-2 py-1 bg-gray-200 text-gray-600 text-center border cursor-pointer hover:bg-gray-300" 
    77→            onClick={handleBottomClick}
    78→          >
    79→            {getBottomText()}
    80→          </td>
    81→        </tr>
    82→      </tbody>
    83→    </table>
    84→  );
    85→};
    86→
    87→export default DriggsPackMedallion;
```

_**Agent (claude-sonnet-4-20250514)**_

- [X] 🌡️ Research /driggsman page structure and functionality


_**Agent (claude-sonnet-4-20250514)**_

# /driggsman Page Research Summary

I've thoroughly researched the `/driggsman` page structure and functionality. Here's what I found:

## Page Architecture
- **Main Entry**: `app/(protected)/driggsman/page.tsx` - Simple metadata wrapper that renders `DriggsmanClient`
- **Client Component**: `app/(protected)/driggsman/pclient.tsx` - Auth wrapper with header controls and state management
- **Core Component**: `app/(protected)/driggsman/components/DriggsmanTable.tsx` - The main data table (43k+ lines)

## Key Functionality

### Authentication & User Management
- Uses `useAuth()` context for authentication
- Redirects to `/login` if user not authenticated
- Fetches user internal ID from `users` table using auth ID

### Data Sources
- **Primary Table**: `sitespren` - Contains all site data with extensive "driggs_" prefixed fields
- **Supporting Tables**: 
  - `call_platforms` - Phone platform configurations
  - `citation_gigs` - Citation management data
  - `address_species` - Address format specifications
  - `sitespren_tags` & `sitespren_tags_relations` - Tagging system

### Core Features

#### 1. **Site Data Management**
- Displays sites from `sitespren` table filtered by user
- Extensive inline editing for all driggs_ fields (business name, industry, city, contact info, etc.)
- Boolean toggle controls for site classifications (is_competitor, is_external, etc.)

#### 2. **Filtering System** ("Chambers")
- **Fog Chamber**: Default view (activefilterchamber=fog)
- **Daylight Filter**: Manual site selection mode
- **Rain Filter**: Tag-based filtering using sitespren_tags

#### 3. **Search & Pagination**
- Field-based search functionality
- Configurable pagination (items per page)
- Column pagination for managing wide table display

#### 4. **Interactive Elements**
- **DriggsPackMedallion**: Multi-level action component (zz1/zz2/zz3, contextual text, driggspack actions)
- **Dropdown Selectors**: For call platforms, citation gigs, address species
- **Verification Column**: Optional data verification display
- **Competitor Sites Toggle**: Show/hide competitor sites

#### 5. **Navigation Integration**
- **DrenjariButtonBar**: Links to related tools (/sitejar4, /cgigjar, /callplatjar, etc.)
- **Header Toggle**: Can hide/show main page header with localStorage persistence

### API Integration
- Uses Supabase for all database operations
- Two main API endpoints:
  - `/api/sitespren_tags` - Fetches user tags
  - `/api/get_sites_by_tag` - Gets sites by tag ID

### State Management
- Complex state for filtering modes, pagination, search, and UI toggles
- URL parameter management for persistent state (activefilterchamber, sitespren_tag)
- LocalStorage for UI preferences

The page serves as a comprehensive business site management interface with extensive filtering, editing, and organizational capabilities.
